entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 02:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 19 January 2023
